title: Intensive Training in English Oral Presentation and Visual Communication for [Large-Scale] Mathematics Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced domain knowledge in mathematics and basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Application of multimodal pedagogy to help mathematics professionals overcome language barriers and insufficient visual expression during English presentations

learning_goals: Learners will deliver a 5-minute English presentation on a mathematics topic, maintaining clear pronunciation and grammatical structures in over 80% of the content.
Learners will effectively utilize at least three types of visual aids (diagrams, charts, animations) to convey complex mathematical concepts during presentations.
Learners will improve the visual consistency of presentation materials by over 70% using peer feedback and AI analysis tools.

resources: Visual Content Creation Tools (e.g., Canva, Miro)
English Sentence Analysis Tools (e.g., Grammarly, Hemingway)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
